input.content:
&INPUTPP
    outdir = {% raw %}'{{ JOB_WORK_DIR }}/outdir'{% endraw %}
    prefix = '__prefix__'
    plot_num = 7
    kpoint = 1
    kband = {% raw %}{{ KBAND_VALUE | default(1) }}{% endraw %}
    lsign = .true.
/
&PLOT
    iflag = 1
    fileout = 'wf_r.dat'
    output_format = 0
    x0(1) = 0.0, x0(2) = 0.0, x0(3) = 0.0
    e1(1) = 0.0, e1(2) = 0.0, e1(3) = 1.0
    nx = 200
/
